snippet: A judge rules that the Bloomberg administration is siding with Hasidic Jews in a development plan that would discriminate against blacks and Latinos.
abstract: A judge rules that the Bloomberg administration is siding with Hasidic Jews in a development plan that would discriminate against blacks and Latinos.

headline.main: Judge Cites Bias in Halting Brooklyn Development Plan
headline.print_headline: Judge Gives City an Earful In a Dispute Over Housing
